meanings.sent1: The teacher misseated the student at the wrong desk.
meanings.sent2: She misseated herself at the dining table, causing discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The misseated penguin ended up on the elephant's back in the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The misseated puzzle piece refused to fit in the wrong spot.
meanings.sent5: The misseated chair wobbled dangerously, threatening to tip over.

meanings.definition: To place in an improper or unsuitable seat.
meanings.sent1: The airline staff misseated the passenger in the last row.
meanings.sent2: He misseated the fragile vase on the edge of the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The misseated teddy bear found itself in the toy box instead of the bed.
meanings.sent4: The misseated queen felt like a pawn in the wrong place on the chessboard.
meanings.sent5: The misseated baby cried as the car hit a bump on the road.
